Posts.Content: Jul 27, 2013 02:33AM beccc81 wrote: I am having a lumpectomy on the 2nd August. It was scheduled to be an open duct excision due to bleeding from a single duct on my right breast. A lump has since been found with what may be a second lump next to it so I am now having the lumpectomy... approximately an old film cannister size was to be removed, so now its that plus a lump or two. Though I am no stranger to surgery, this will be my first breast procedure.... It is starting to get scary!
Posts.Title: August 2013 Surgeries laura11103 babs6287

Posts.Content: Jul 27, 2013 04:50AM beccc81 wrote: Hi, yes, there is a lump that is being concentrated on, I think I had a bit of a panic attack when wrote that before lol (deep breath). I am glad I got that out, been trying to find words to explain my fears, I think its like you explained!
Posts.Title: how many people just "knew", and was it ? Fire1978 zoemiapepper

Posts.Content: Jul 27, 2013 12:20AM beccc81 wrote: I got checked out due to spontaneous bloody nipple discharge and am booked for surgery to remove the ducts from my right breast and now to remove a lump that has been found in the meantime... my surgery is less then a week away now and I have always known that I have a strong family history of breast cancer but... I just know it is not, I was sure it was just a cyst but my surgeon assures me it can not be a cyst. So im sure its just a papillona. I am standing tall (funny since im only 5"2) and saying "it won't happen to me!" I know that its usually those that say it wont happen that it does happen to but its exactly like you say, I just know! My dr told me that I need to be open yo the possibility that it is something malignant but when I tried to rationalise that it might be cancerous, I feel like a fraud, like its a dramatic over-reaction and I sound like a hypochondriac! I just know.... well I will soon!
Posts.Title: how many people just "knew", and was it ? Fire1978 zoemiapepper

Posts.Content: Jul 28, 2013 06:10PM beccc81 wrote: Personally, I am scared as my surgery is 4 days away. It was suppposed to be a duct excision because of bloody discharge. Now its a lumpectomy for a lump and possible second lump that are not visible on mammogram or u/s. Everytime I start to freak out and think maybe I dont need surgery and just wait and see... Ive seen a story that tells me not to stop til I know!
